campaign.keepsakes.title: Keepsakes
campaign.keepsakes.terms1: Don’t let your beautiful memories of Vietnam fade away. Let us help you remember your trip and share your experience with your family and friends with locally made items and must-buys that you can bring home with. What’s more, join hands-on workshop in Vietnam to create unique and one of a kind souvenirs, and capture real character of Vietnam in places and scenes that encapsulate the country, including many that travelers overlook.

campaign.authenticexp.title: Authentic Experiences
campaign.authenticexp.desc: Never run out of things to do in Vietnam with our must-sees and must-dos! If you're looking for UNESCO World Heritage sites, Halong Bay isn't the only place to go. Explore Hanoi's Ninh Binh, ancient city of Hoi An, My Son Sanctuary as well. With over 100 different experiences, we offer and cater to unique experiences for everyone here - be it Cultural, Adventurous, Family-friendly and more! Enter promo code FAYVIET19 at checkout and enjoy 5% discount on selected experiences.
campaign.authenticexp.mobile.desc: Never run out of things to do in Vietnam with our must-sees and must dos! Find curated Join in, Private and Unique Experiences for everyone here - Cultural, Adventurous, Family-friendly and more. Enter promo code FAYVIET19 at checkout and enjoy 5% discount on selected experiences now.
campaign.authenticexp.coupon.desc: Applicable to more than 200 selected experiences *
campaign.authenticexp.hcmc.experience1.t: Saigon Skydeck in Bitexco Financial Tower Ticket
campaign.authenticexp.hcmc.experience1.d: Stunning 360° views of the city and its surrounding at the highest offical Heinekin bar.
campaign.authenticexp.hcmc.experience2.d: 200km in length, enter the Cu Chi Tunnels and explore the remains of the Vietnam War.
campaign.authenticexp.hcmc.experience3.d: Explore the Saigon timeless charm via the unique architectural construction.
campaign.authenticexp.hcmc.experience4.d: Depart for My Tho, Ben Tre and boarding the sampan to the four beautiful islands with countryside peaceful view, local activities.
Hoa Lu & Tam Coc Trip - Full Day Join in Tour
Looking for a short trip? With stunning scenery, Ninh Binh is your best choice.
Halong Bay Cruise via Wonderful Nature Wonders
Listed as one of UNESCO's world heritage sites, visit Halong Bay and admire its spectacular landscapes.
Phu Lang Pottery Village - Half Day Private Tour
Travel along the Red River to Vietnam's countryside and learn about handmade pottery at Bat Trang Village.
Treasure Hunt: Urban Tales of Thang Long
Based on urban tales of Thang Long, discover Hanoi through a treasure hunt in the heart of the city.
Tan Thanh Mural Art Village Weekends Tour
Exploring the 100 or so murals in the tranquil seaside town makes for one of the most intriguing day trips.
Hoi An City Trip & Lantern Making Workshop
Enjoy the fun trip through the most highlighted spots in Hoi An and join the lantern making workshop.
Exploring the My Son stunning ruin temple of the old Champa kingdom that dated back six centuries ago.
The Dreamlike Ba Na Hill and Fantasy Park Join-in Tour
Ba Na Hills is a mountaintop resort complex that looks like a medieval castle, inside these stone walls are modern accommodations.
campaign.authenticexp.nhaTrang.experienc: Vietnam Spa On The Nha Trang Beach
Experience the peaceful space of the only one spa located in Nha Trang center and on the beach with wide range of massages, scrubs, and wraps.
A perfect place for the active and adventure minded traveler, take a day in the great outdoor and observe the marvelous landscape around.
Craft Beer Tour with Vespa in Nha Trang
Driving along the Fairy Beach Road and chilling at Ba Ho Waterfalls.
Sunset Cocktail and Dinner on Cruise
Enjoy a magnificent banquet in the style of kings and queens, with soft music and an altogether unrivaled evening.

campaign.bubbles.title: Bubble Legendary in Lighting Garden
campaign.bubbles.desc: Combined with breath-taking illumination and spectacular bubble show, Bubble Legendary in Lighting Garden will definitely keep you and your little ones mesmerised! Fan Yang, the setter of 19 Guinness World Records, has been thrilling audiences around the world for 30 years with the fun of bubbles. Step into the enchanted bubble world with your family and friends and experience Fan’s bubble wondrous in this 60-minute show in Hanoi. Book your tickets now.
campaign.bubbles.mobile.desc: Combined with illumination and spectacular bubble show, Bubble Legendary in Lighting Garden will definitely keep you and your little ones mesmerised! Step into the enchanted Fan Yang’s bubble world with your beloved in Hanoi. Book your tickets now.
campaign.bubbles.location: Yen So Park, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi
campaign.bubbles.experience1.title:
Bubble Legendary & Lighting Garden
19:30 (Thu – Sun)
campaign.bubbles.experience2.title:
Bubble Legendary
14:00 (Sat & Sun), 19:30 (Thu – Sun)
campaign.bubbles.experience3.title:
Lighting Garden
19:00 – 23:00 (Mon – Sun)
campaign.bubbles.terms.desc: • Same price for adults and children • Free admission for children under the age of 2, but they are expected to sit on the lap of an accompanying adult for the duration of the show • Each adult can bring only 1 child who does not occupy a seat • Adult ticket price applies to children above the age of 2

campaign.easter.title: Egg-citing Family Getaway
campaign.easter.desc: Easter is in the air, and it's getting us in the mood for a family getaway. Whether you're getting an early start on that summer tan, or checking out Vietnam's cities at their most beautiful, Easter is a great time to travel. Book your Vietnam experience now and save up to 10% off on all travel packages and day trips.

campaign.central.vietnam.travel.desc: Kick off your summer with Fayfay.com! There’s a dazzling and diverse selection of festivals and activities happening at Da Nang, Hoi An, Hue, Nha Trang and Quang Binh, from fireworks display, hot balloon festival to shows and many more.  Plan ahead and dive into the summer heat with our Central Summer Viet-stival.

campaign.mothers.day.title: Vietnam Getaway with Mom
campaign.mothers.day.desc: Never run out of things to do in Vietnam with our must-sees and must-dos! If you‘re looking for UNESCO World Heritage sites, Halong Bay isn’t the only place to go. Explore Hanoi‘s Ninh Binh, ancient city of Hoi An, My Son Sanctuary as well. With over 200 different experiences, we offer and cater to unique experiences for everyone here - be it Cultural, Adventurous, Family-friendly and more! Enter promo code at checkout and enjoy up to 5% discount on all selected experiences.
campaign.mothers.day.terms: • Promo Codes are valid from 6 May 2019 00:00 to 30 May 2019 23:59 (HKT) • Experience date runs from 6 May 2019 to 31 August 2019 • Enter promo Code FAYMDMAY5 at checkout to enjoy 5% off Vietnam Experiences • Promo Codes cannot be combined with other events or promotions • Promo Codes can only be applied prior to completing the order • The actual selling prices of products are based on the prices listed on the website • The selling prices may fluctuate depending on the exchange rate at the time of payment • In case of any disputes, Fayfay.com reserves the right of final decision
